Package simpleUIApp

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Player
    interface Player, implemented by HumanPlayer and AIPlayer
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AIPlayer
    Class used to represent Artificial intelligence It is possible to launch a game between 2 AI.
    Collision
    This class handles the collisions occurring during spaceships moves
    HumanPlayer
    this Class represents the human player
    KeyListener  
    LoadGame
    This class is used to try and load the previous game saved if a game has been exit before game over
    Main
    Main class, starting the game by calling the run method of Application
    MouseListener
    the MouseListener handles the mouse's actions
    Run
    Run class
    SaveGame
    Class used to save the game
    Squadron
    A squadron is created every time there is an action from a planet, this class handles the cases where several waves of ships have to be sent
